DOC.brief_summary: This study compare blood level sildenafil follow administration experimental tablet vs. conventional oral tablet .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Blood Levels Sildenafil Following Administration Experimental Tablet vs. Conventional Oral Tablet Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index 18 30 kg/m2 , total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Smoking excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day . Treatment experimental drug within 30 day sildenafil , vardenafil , tadalfil within 4 day first study dose . Develop blood pressure lower experience dizziness , lightheadedness go laying position stand position .
